TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WebAppServiceCollectionExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Extensions for IServiceCollection for startup initialization.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder AddMicrosoftWebAppAuthentication (this Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection services, Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration configuration, string configSectionName = "AzureAd", string openIdConnectScheme = "OpenIdConnect", string cookieScheme = "Cookies", bool subscribeToOpenIdConnectMiddlewareDiagnosticsEvents = false);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder AddMicrosoftWebAppAuthentication(class Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection services, class Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration configuration, string configSectionName, string openIdConnectScheme, string cookieScheme, bool subscribeToOpenIdConnectMiddlewareDiagnosticsEvents) cil managed

<Extension()> Public Function AddMicrosoftWebAppAuthentication (services As IServiceCollection, configuration As IConfiguration, Optional configSectionName As String = "AzureAd", Optional openIdConnectScheme As String = "OpenIdConnect", Optional cookieScheme As String = "Cookies", Optional subscribeToOpenIdConnectMiddlewareDiagnosticsEvents As Boolean = false) As AuthenticationBuilder

static member AddMicrosoftWebAppAuthentication : Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection * Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration * string * string * string * bool -> Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder

Docs.param: Service collection to which to add authentication.
The IConfiguration object.
The name of the configuration section with the necessary settings to initialize authentication options.

Optional name for the open id connect authentication scheme (by default OpenIdConnectDefaults.AuthenticationScheme). This can be specified when you want to support several OpenIdConnect identity providers.
Optional name for the cookie authentication scheme (by default OpenIdConnectDefaults.AuthenticationScheme).
Set to true if you want to debug, or just understand the OpenIdConnect events.
Docs.summary: Add authentication with Microsoft identity platform. This method expects the configuration file will have a section, (by default named "AzureAd"), with the necessary settings to initialize the authentication options.
Docs.returns: The authentication builder to chain extension methods.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("Use AddMicrosoftWebAppCallsWebApi on the result of AddMicrosoftWebAppAuthentication or AddMicrosoftWebApp. See https://aka.ms/ms-id-web/net5")]
[<System.Obsolete("Use AddMicrosoftWebAppCallsWebApi on the result of AddMicrosoftWebAppAuthentication or AddMicrosoftWebApp. See https://aka.ms/ms-id-web/net5")>]

Docs.param: Service collection to which to add authentication.
Configuration.
The name of the configuration section with the necessary settings to initialize authentication options.

Optional name for the open id connect authentication scheme (by default OpenIdConnectDefaults.AuthenticationScheme). This can be specified when you want to support several OpenIdConnect identity providers.
Docs.summary: Enable Web Apps to call APIs (acquiring tokens with MSAL.NET).
Docs.remarks: This method cannot be used with Azure AD B2C as, with B2C an initial scope needs to be provided.
